name: Planting Chaos
description: "Planting Chaos" is about the small push you need to turn a finely balanced system into a state of ever increasing disorder. The neatly balanced system is your neighbour's garden, tended to by a group of gardeners who keep the hedges, grass and flowers in excellent condition. The not so gentle push is delivered by the player, by placing small and big chaotic elements in the garden. Can you outwit the gardeners and let nature reclaim the garden?
